subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Matrooh rallied to beat Mylute by one and three-quarters lengths in the $196,000 Bold Ruler Handicap at Belmont Park in Elmont, N.Y.
snippet: Matrooh rallied to beat Mylute by one and three-quarters lengths in the $196,000 Bold Ruler Handicap at Belmont Park in Elmont, N.Y.
